propel.core.collections.volatiles
Class ValueSessionStore<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>

java.lang.Object
  propel.core.collections.volatiles.ValueSessionStore<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<T>, IValueStore<T>, ReifiedIterable<T>, ISessionStore<T>, IShared
public class ValueSessionStore<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISessionStore<T>, IValueStore<T>

A type-aware thread-safe Session object that allows multiple threads to operate on a collection of time-expiring objects. This collection does not allow null keys to be inserted. Instantiate using e.g.: new ValueSessionStore<String>(1000*60, 5000){}; -OR- new ValueSessionStore<String>(1000*60, 5000, String.class);

Constructor Detail

ValueSessionStore

public ValueSessionStore(int expirationMillis,
                         int pollingIntervalMillis)
Overloaded constructor, initializes session with a session expiration time and polling interval in milliseconds. Set to CONSTANT.TIMEOUT_INFINITE to disable expiration.

getExpirationMillis

public int getExpirationMillis()
Gets the duration of a session in milliseconds. If the value is CONSTANT.TIMEOUT_INFINITE then there is no expiration.
